info.title: Dev Portal API
info.description:
Welcome to the documentation for the Dev Portal API, self-managed edition.

Disclaimer: This document is currently in beta. It might not contain all possible endpoints and requests, and request descriptions are not complete.
If you find a missing request or run into an error in the documentation, please file an issue in our Github repository, or submit a PR to update the Dev Portal API spec.

get.description:
Log in to a Dev Portal account using HTTP Basic auth.

The `username` is your developer portal account email address. The `password` is the password you chose when signing up.

For example:

`Authorization: Basic base64(user@example.com:password)`

This endpoint returns a `Set-Cookie` header that looks similar to the following:

```
portal_session=LBTguN3iEqQlYK3089Ij2Q|1622804485|AXQzsTuR_M3TGFkUV6PzzXPpFtA; Path=/; SameSite=Strict; HttpOnly
```

This ID must be sent on all subsequent requests in the `Cookie` header like so:

```
Cookie: portal_session=LBTguN3iEqQlYK3089Ij2Q|1622804485|AXQzsTuR_M3TGFkUV6PzzXPpFtA
```

post.description: Create a new Dev Portal account

401.description: Token is invalid or has already been used/invalidated

post.description: Verify an account that has been approved by an admin by providing a JWT that has been emailed to the developer
Trigger redelivery of the account verification email
Prevent an account validation token from being used

200.description: Token is valid. This endpoint does not return a body

post.description: Check if the reset token provided is valid. This endpoint does not invalidate the token after checking

200.description: Password reset. This endpoint does not return a body

post.description: Reset a password by providing a token and a new password

200.description: Reset email sent. This endpoint does not return a body

get.description: List all of the files uploaded to the portal
Get the currently logged in developer's details
Get metadata associated with the current user

patch.description: Change the currently logged in user's password
Update the currently logged in user's email

200.description: Metadata updated. This endpoint does not return a body
